2.title: Payments for Foreign Economic Activity
2.description: We pay invoices to foreign suppliers through a network of legal entities in 30+ countries. We document all transactions and bypass banking restrictions

HowToUse.subtitle: Manage your financial operations in one Telegram bot. Our bot is a convenient tool for managing finances, where you can order cryptocurrency exchanges, transfers, bill payments, currency exchange, and manager consultations
